text: The following predefined constants are available in the APL language. Constant Description Example Constant Description Example null Can be used to evaluate if a field has been assigned a value. if ( NumFld != null ) true / false Value of a boolean variable myBool = true; WORKFLOW_NAME The workflow configuration name. Note! If used in a workflow with name Default.MyWorkflow.workflow_1, this constant will hold the value Default.MyWorkflow. If the full name is needed, i.e. Default.MyWorkflow.workflow_1, use mimGet("Workflow", "Workflow Name") instead. debug("Name of workflow:" + WORKFLOW_NAME); AGENT_NAME The Agent name where the variable is called from. debug("Name of Agent:" + AGENT_NAME);
title: Constants - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
